data.name: abandonedHouse_01
data.value: ${§The door is locked. And I do not think that a simple key would be enough to open it}

data.name: Gindella_1
data.value:
Hello my dear. Is it your first time here in Hollowrock? In the north, there is the public district with its pub. In the south the Warriors district his famous Hall. In the east you will find the Magic and Shadow district.
Oh, and about your orb? Hm... Try to speak with Calidur. He is probably somewhere at the market.

data.name: Gindella_2
data.value: My legs hurt.

data.name: Gindella_3
data.value: My knees hurt.

data.name: Gindella_4
data.value: Did I tell you the story of my old cat?

data.name: Gindella_5
data.value: My hands hurt.

data.name: Gindella_6
data.value: Where is my dog? Have you seen him? He has like... 4 legs and a tail.

data.name: Gindella_7
data.value: I am tired.

data.name: Gindella_8
data.value: I want to be a princess.

data.name: Gindella_9
data.value: I can hear them talk. They talk about... Yes! I know whar they want. But where is this Village of Whispers?

data.name: hollowrock_SignPost01
data.value: This road leads to the Wuran Forest.

data.name: hollowrock_SignPost02
data.value: No littering! No begging! Dogs and cats allowed.

data.name: hollowrock_SignPost03
data.value: ${§What does it say?} 'You no go over bridge!' ${§There is no bridge. And who writes like this?}

data.name: hollowrock_story_01
data.value:
I have reached Hollowrock. A nice town actually.
It has been completely rebuild after the war against the Xesh.
Lets see if I can find somone for this orb thingy.
Or maybe I should go to the pub first...
Hint: Talk to the citizens. They might say something intresting.

data.name: Jongar_1
data.value: I do not wanna talk right now!

data.name: Serina_1
data.value: Hello stranger, my husband Jongar is in a bad mood because of the spiders infront of the town. Nobody wants to deal with them. Not even the guards. Maybe you can helo us? And if you're already there, mind bring me 6 spider eyes? I need them for ... things....

data.name: Serina_2
data.value: Thank you for the eyes! Can I ask you for one more thing? Geddh, the merchant, needs some goods to be delivered. Would you be so kind to help him? I would do it myself but I have things to do...

data.name: Serina_3
data.value: Hm... are you done with the spiders yet?

data.name: Serina_4
data.value: Did you help Geddh already?

data.name: Geddh_1
data.value: Hello my friend. Do you need something? I can supply you with anything. ... almost anything...

data.name: Geddh_2
data.value: Would be nice if you can help me with something... My knee has been hit by an arrow some time ago and it hurts a lot. Can you deliver this pants to Betty? She is usually at the pub.

data.name: Geddh_3
data.value: How is you pants delivery going?

data.name: Geddh_4
data.value: You have legendary delivery skills, I know, but we do not need to be best friends now. Do we?

data.name: abandonedHouse_02
data.value: ${§What the hell was that?}

data.name: Calidur_1
data.value:
Hello stranger. My name is Calidur. Is this you first stay in Hollowrock? A quite nice little city!
What is that? Wow! You have found one of the twelve orbs of balance! Never heard of that? Those orbs - correctly aligned - bring balance to the world. Unfortunately they have been stolen by Imes, the lesser god of envy. They must be found! If you want to help us, meet mayor Jongar in his house in the south. They say he knows something.

data.name: Jongar_2
data.value: Calidur sent you, right? This crazy old man. With his stupid magic balls. We have more important things to do! But ok, you helped us, so I will help you... IF you can solve this riddle: I only exist when light is present, yet light on me is my immediate death. What am I?

data.name: Jongar_3
data.value: That is correct my friend! Well, listen. Geddh, the trader on the market sold some kind of orb ... or however you call it. He seems to be quite upset about it. That is all I can tell.

data.name: Jongar_4
data.value: I have work to do now.

data.name: Serina_5
data.value: Thank you for your help. I could convince Jongar to talk with you.

data.name: Betty_1
data.value: Oh! Thank you! It only took four days to deliver...

data.name: Betty_2
data.value: You want a beer? A bed? A beer in a bed? We have both!

data.name: Geddh_5
data.value:
So, you know about my... trade? This damn guy in his green cape. I think his name is Olir. Some kind of wizard I would say. I did not want to sell it, but somehow I did...
No idea where he is, but he still must be in Hollowrock.
